ooC:
An excellent question Jonathan. Hottie4u2have, everything you do 
requires a post to go with it. If you want to set a trap, then you 
have to say that your character is setting a trap. Since you didn't 
post in advance for setting traps, it is really up to Jonathan to 
determine whether he minds that there are traps to slow his escape.

Don't worry about your mistakes, they happen. Even for experienced 
RPers they happen on occasion. Making a mistake means nothing, 
learning from your errors, is absolutely cruicial. =)

As I recall, Lynxiz was waiting on the north side of the base, under 
a tree and therefore must see Panthos.

-- Lynxiz --

Lynxiz perks up as an unknown panther bot comes into view. "Lynxiz 
Transform." She murmurs quietly. Her form folds, and paws become 
powerful arms and legs. She frowns, "Who are you?" Wary, but not 
entirely battle ready, she looks over the bot. She is surprised when 
her mild sensors pick up that he is a Maximal. "You're a maximal! I 
heard the base fire off a few shots, do you know what happened?" 
Lynxiz was almost at ease after that last discovery.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> OOC:
> 
> When did you set these traps up and the posts saying Cheetara did 
so? Also
> what kind of traps are these?
